[code]else if (command.startsWith("home"))
   {
     if(absY >= 3672)

         removeAllItems();
     sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.");
     }
      teleportToX = 3253;
     teleportToY = 3431;
  }[/code][/quote]

item.description:
@viruz_3 wrote:

NO!.. That will remove all items before you teleport… Do this:

else if (command.startsWith("home"))
      {
      teleportToX = 3253;
      teleportToY = 3431;
      }

Try that see if it works

item.title: "home losing items
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("home")) { if(absY >= 3672) { sendMessage("You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness."); removeAllItems(); } else if(absY <= 3672) { teleportToX = 3253; teleportToY = 3431; } }
THIS should work

ok i want a "home command going to the bank iv got but wen u do it u lose ur items iv got tht … the thing is if ur over lvl 20wildy u lose all items on u wen u do it(not wot ur welding just like ::empty) if ur under lvl 20 wildy u dnt lose ur items

else if (command.startsWith(“home”))
{
if(absY >= 3672)
{
sendMessage(“You cannot teleport above level 20 wilderness.”);
}
teleportToX = 3253;
teleportToY = 3431;
removeAllItems();
}

thts cnt teleport to home over 20wildy ,… but wereva u r u lose items anyone now how to make it so only wen ur over lvl 20 wildy u lose em?
